name: NeuroQuantology : SCOPUS Indexed-Call for Submission
content: NeuroQuantologyÂ© is an interdisciplinary journal that crosses the boundaries of neuroscience and physics. The rapidly accumulating empirical data in the neuroscience, cognitive science and technical domains will be made available to theorists in order to stimulate a synthesis or provoke new models. NeuroQuantology is published monthly. The main objective of the journal is to provide a platform to the researchers and practitioners from both academia as well as industry to meet and share cutting-edge development in the related fields. All accepted papers from NeuroQuantology will be published in the upcoming issues and will also be considered for publication in our associated Scopus and other major indexing databases. Publish your articles in NeuroQuantology and get more citations for your article. This call for papers solicits original research, reviews and case studies that is highly informative for the Scientific community.
